New Records: Afif Hossain scores 1000 runs in T20 cricket
Key Match Events: Pakistan makes it to the semifinals of the T20 World Cup winning against Bangladesh
Shan Masood hits the ball for 2 runs and Pakistan win the match by 5 wickets
Shakib Al Hasan could not make a mark through his captaincy or bowling getting 1 wicket for 35 runs and becoming the costliest bowler for Bangladesh
Nasum Ahmed stood out for Bangladesh in the bowling department, keeping Bangladesh in the match till he was bowling
Flourish from Shan Masood in the end did the job for Pakistan
Najmul Hossain Shanto scored a fifty
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 4 wickets for 22 runs
Shadab Khan dismissed Soumya Sarkar and Shakib Al Hasan in two balls
Pre-Game Insights: A win against Bangladesh in the match would mean a lot for Pakistan that have had trouble up until now
While Pakistan are more likely than Bangladesh to go to the semifinals, both Pakistan and Bangladesh will enter the game in Adelaide with some measure of influence over their outcomes
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh could not capitalize on the good start by Najmul Hossain Shanto and that total was never going to be enough for the Pakistani batting lineup
In the bowling department, Bangladesh looked sloppy in the field, and could not capitalize on the chances provided by the Pakistani Batters
